casebody.data:
No. 460,

Misc.

Abel v. Beto, Corrections Director. Livingston Hall for petitioner. Crawford C. Martin, Attorney General of Texas, Nola White, First Assistant Attorney General, Robert C. Flowers and Alio B. Crow, Jr., Assistant Attorneys General, and Hawthorne Phillips, Executive Assistant Attorney General, for respondent.

Ct. Crim. App. Tex. Certiorari denied.
